mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `user_info_test` ( `user_id` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL, `locked` INT (11) NOT NULL, `login_name` VARCHAR (50) NOT NULL, `login_pwd` VARCHAR (200) NOT NULL, `real_name` VARCHAR (50) DEFAULT NULL, `phone` VARCHAR (100) DEFAULT NULL, `org_id` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL COMMENT '不可为空，无则为0', `sex` VARCHAR (10) DEFAULT NULL, `description` VARCHAR (400) DEFAULT NULL, `workarea` VARCHAR (100) DEFAULT NULL, `email` VARCHAR (200) DEFAULT NULL, `dimissiontime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `updatetime` datetime NOT NULL, `entrydate` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `workage` INT (11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`) ) ENGINE = INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8

CREATE TABLE `org_main` ( `org_id` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL, `code` VARCHAR (100) DEFAULT NULL, `name` VARCHAR (200) NOT NULL, `description` VARCHAR (400) DEFAULT NULL, `sort` INT (11) NOT NULL, `leader_id` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL, `enabled` TINYINT (4) NOT NULL, `updatetime` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`org_id`) ) ENGINE = INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8;
